title: Strange behaviour after update to QP1A.191005.007
content:
After restarting my device to finish the update to QP1A.191005.007, my device acted strangely. I lost my display settings, can't switvch to dark mode, can't scroll down the upper bar for the notifications and the options buttons, can't launch Google Assitant, can't open multitasking with the middle button and so on...
Please help me !
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3 XL
